references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it provides a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model whose capabilities are relevant to the development of spatial intelligence in AI.

references.paper_title: NetVLAD: CNN architecture for weakly supervised place recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces NetVLAD, a deep learning model used for visual place recognition, a core component of the MSG task proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: 3D scene graph: A structure for unified semantics, 3D space, and camera
references.reason: This paper presents the concept of 3D scene graphs, which directly inspired the proposed MSG, offering a relevant structure for representing spatial relationships.

references.paper_title: DINOv2: Learning robust visual features without supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces DINOv2, a self-supervised vision model used as the backbone for the proposed AoMSG model, and its strong visual representation capabilities are crucial for the MSG generation task.

references.paper_title: SuperGlue: Learning feature matching with graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces SuperGlue, a neural network model that learns feature matching, a key technique for object association which is another core component of the proposed MSG task.
